footnotes.1: see Note 2.2 in Part 1 of this Schedule
footnotes.2: for the special conditions relating to “specific processes”, see Notes 6.1 and 6.3 in Part 1 of this Schedule
footnotes.3: for the special conditions relating to “specific processes”, see Note 6.2 in Part 1 of this Schedule
footnotes.4: a “group” is regarded as any part of the heading separated from the rest by a semi-colon
footnotes.5: in the case of the goods composed of materials classified within both headings 3901 to 3906, on the one hand, and within headings 3907 to 3911, on the other hand, this restriction only applies to that group of materials which predominates by weight in the good
footnotes.6: the following foils are to be considered as highly transparent: foils, the optical dimming of which, measured according to ASTM-D 1003-16(5) by Gardner Hazemeter (i.e. Hazefactor), is less than 2%
footnotes.7: for special conditions relating to goods made of a mixture of textile materials, see Note 4 in Part 1 of this Schedule
footnotes.8: the use of this material is restricted to the manufacture of woven fabrics of a kind used in paper-making machinery
footnotes.9: see Note 5 in Part 1 of this Schedule
footnotes.10: see Note 4 in Part 1 of this Schedule
footnotes.11: for knitted or crocheted articles, not elastic or rubberised, obtained by sewing or assembling pieces of knitted or crocheted fabrics (cut out or knitted directly to shape), see Note 5 in Part 1 of this Schedule
